lead_paragraph: YOUNG--Ken. On March 14, 2016, Ken Young "the Famous" lost his battle with cancer. A longtime resident of NYC, originally from Lewisburg, PA. Ken was the beloved husband of Barbara "Bobbe" Rell-Young; loving son of Isabel Attinger (Skip) of Turbottville, PA and the late Kenneth R. Young, Sr. of Lewisburg, PA and the cherished son-in-law of Barbara Rell of Haddonfield, NJ. Ken's family will receive friends on Saturday, March 19th, 10:30-11:45am, at Kain- Murphy Funeral Services, Haddonfield, NJ; with a Service to follow at 11:45am. Interment, will be at the Haddonfield Baptist Cemetery. Ken's family suggests memorial contributions in his honor be made to Alley Cat Allies, City Harvest and the Colon Cancer Alliance. 1/3
